title: The AMD Gaming PC - Ryzen + Radeon 7
description: Radeon VII is here but paired with Ryzen 7 2700X is an all AMD gaming PC worth it? AMD Radeon VII:  Everything AMD announced at CES 2019:   Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
